data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Vargovitsh, Robert S. (2013): Cavernicolous Arrhopalites abchasicus sp. nov. (Collembola: Symphypleona: Arrhopalitidae) from the West Caucasus with a key to the World species of the genus. Zootaxa 3666 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3666.1.2
